mapper.select: SELECT B.board_id AS "BoardId", B.title AS "BoardTitle", B.contents AS "BoardContents", B.created_date AS "BoardCreatedDate", B.updated_date AS "BoardUpdatedDate", U.user_id AS "UserId", U.email AS "UserEmail", U.nickname AS "UserNickName", U.created_date AS "UserCreatedDate", U.role AS "UserRole", C.category_id AS "CategoryId", C.name AS "CategoryName" FROM Board AS B LEFT OUTER JOIN category AS C on (B.category_id = C.category_id) LEFT OUTER JOIN User AS U on (B.user_id = U.user_id) ORDER BY B.board_id desc

SELECT B.board_id AS "BoardId", B.title AS "BoardTitle", B.contents AS "BoardContents", B.created_date AS "BoardCreatedDate", B.updated_date AS "BoardUpdatedDate", U.user_id AS "UserId", U.email AS "UserEmail", U.nickname AS "UserNickName", U.created_date AS "UserCreatedDate", U.role AS "UserRole", C.category_id AS "CategoryId", C.name AS "CategoryName" FROM Board AS B LEFT OUTER JOIN User AS U on (B.user_id = U.user_id) LEFT OUTER JOIN category AS C on (B.category_id = C.category_id) WHERE B.board_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Board ( title, contents, user_id, category_id, created_date, updated_date ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{contents}, #{creator.userId}, #{category.id}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE Board SET title = #{board.title}, contents = #{board.contents}, updated_date = now() WHERE board_id = #{id};
